Package io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.quest

Class Quest

java.lang.Object
io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.quest.Quest
Direct Known Subclasses:
SuperQuest
public class Quest extends Object
Manages the execution flow and data storage for test scenarios.

This class acts as the central controller for executing test operations, managing service interactions, and storing data during a test run. It allows transitioning between different testing contexts (rings) and ensures test completion with proper validations.

  • Method Details

    • use

      public <T extends FluentService> T use(Class<T> ring)
      Transitions the test execution context into the specified ring (test service).

      This method retrieves a registered service by its class type and allows the test execution to proceed within that context.

      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the fluent service.
      Parameters:
      ring - The class type of the desired test service.
      Returns:
      The corresponding fluent service instance.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the specified ring is not registered.

    • cast

      protected <T extends FluentService> T cast(Class<T> ringType)
      Retrieves a registered fluent service without modifying the execution context.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the fluent service.
      Parameters:
      ringType - The class type of the service to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The corresponding service instance.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the specified ring is not registered.

    • complete

      public void complete()
      Marks the completion of the test execution.

      This method logs the completion, clears the test execution state, and verifies all soft assertions collected during the test execution.

    • artifact

      protected <T extends FluentService, K> K artifact(Class<T> ringType, Class<K> artifactType)
      Retrieves an artifact associated with a specific test service.

      This method extracts an instance of the specified artifact type from the requested test service.

      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the test service.
      K - The type of the artifact.
      Parameters:
      ringType - The class type of the test service.
      artifactType - The class type of the artifact to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The retrieved artifact instance.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If input parameters are null.
      IllegalStateException - If the requested ring is not available.

    • registerRing

      protected void registerRing(Class<? extends FluentService> ringType, FluentService ring)
      Registers a new test service into the current execution context.
      Parameters:
      ringType - The class type of the test service.
      ring - The instance of the test service.

    • removeRing

      protected void removeRing(Class<? extends FluentService> ringType)
      Removes a test service from the current execution context.
      Parameters:
      ringType - The class type of the test service to remove.

    • getStorage

      protected Storage getStorage()
      Provides access to the storage instance for managing temporary test data.
      Returns:
      The storage instance.

    • getSoftAssertions

      protected CustomSoftAssertion getSoftAssertions()
      Provides access to the soft assertion handler for managing test validations.
      Returns:
      The soft assertion handler.
